mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cp_orderinfo_ct (order_id, train_num, station_name, entrance) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{trainNo}, #{fromCity}, #{ticketEntrance})
INSERT INTO cp_orderinfo_ct_change (order_id, change_id, train_num, station_name, entrance) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{changeId}, #{trainNo}, #{fromCity}, #{ticketEntrance})
